alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Montgomery; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 9:11PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grimes, west central Montgomery and northeastern Waller Counties through 945 PM CST... At 911 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Magnolia, or near Pinehurst, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Conroe, Pinehurst, Panorama Village, Magnolia, Montgomery, Todd Mission, Lake Conroe Dam and Dobbin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Texas.
